label: Princess Prep Office 17
description:
John heads over to the completely still plant and grabs the pruning shears that is sitting inside the pot.
He then starts to prune the other plant, when it releases it's captive, a middle-aged women, who confirms she is the Head Mistress.
When she's able to talk she tells him that a male and female voice entered the room and ransacked the office.
The male said the female needed to get back to Fairy Godcollege if she's going to train an army of witches.

Meanwhile a con artist from Cerulea is about to take one his his biggest gambles...

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
